title: Three women
creator_credit: David H. Fowler, New Zealand National Film Unit and David Sims
brief_description: A brief encounter with three artists - Alison Duff and Ria Bancroft are sculptors, and Yvonne Rust a potter. The film reflects on how their deep involvement with nature and spiritual matters inspire their work.
